summary: An Ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to incur an indebtedness in an amount not to exceed Twenty-five Hundred ($2500.00) Dollars against the General Fund for the purpose of completing the improvement of Sixth Avenue South from Andover Street to Oregon Street by planking the same as authorized by Ordinance No. 20631 to the extending of said improvement on Sixth Avenue South from Oregon Street to the north margin of Henrietta Street and from the existing planking on Sixth Avenue South to the east margin of Maynard Avenue.
